name: sust-club
description: AUSTCMS is a full-featured, digital platform designed to revolutionize how clubs at Ahsanullah University of Science and Technology (AUST) manage their operations. It addresses key issues like manual spreadsheet management, a lack of centralized websites, offline payments, and fragmented event management. AUSTCMS provides a seamless, automated solution that centralizes club management in one place, offering an efficient and streamlined experience for both admins and members.
